item.title: Npc talking help needed
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

To compile, the is a compile.bat file in your source folder. Open it double click and wait till it says ‘click any button to continue’ Then, it will be compiled!

npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Have_Fun_playing_in_the_land_of_Dingleydell!”;
}
if(misc.random(50) == npc 2643) {

Wtf? you don’t put NPC id in misc random.

There are the old people then the new senior members…

item.title: Npc talking help needed
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

ok first this is what you do go in to npchandler.java and look for this

npcs[i].updateRequired = true;

then you should see something like this:

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "text here"; } if(misc.random(50) == npc id here) {
if you cant find this look this up:

}  else if (npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc == true) {

then press enter after that and add this:

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "text here"; } if(misc.random(50) == npc id here) {
then where it says npc id here lol put the npc id there and where it says text here put what you want it to say.

Read full topic
